# Claude Chef

> Delicious, tested recipes with AI-powered cooking guidance.

## Recipes

- [Teriyaki and Sesame Seed Chicken](https://claudechef.com/teriyaki-and-sesame-seed-chicken.html): Pan-seared chicken in a sticky homemade teriyaki glaze, finished with a shower of sesame seeds.
- [Teriyaki Roasted Broccoli](https://claudechef.com/teriyaki-roasted-broccoli.html): Oven-roasted broccoli glazed with teriyaki and Worcestershire sauce, finished with black pepper and garlic.

## Categories

- [Main Course](https://claudechef.com/category/main-course.html)
- [Side Dish](https://claudechef.com/category/side-dish.html)

## Cuisines

- [Japanese-American](https://claudechef.com/cuisine/japanese-american.html)
